accepted: Confirm your consent to the contract and the processing of personal data
action_prescription: You can freely navigate through the pages within our mini-application, continuing to use it while the data is updated. Once the updates are complete, we'll notify you.
connect_wallet_mainnet: Please connect the wallet from the main network
contract_for_seller: Contract between the course creator and the marketplace Online Courses
contract_for_seller_1_1: 1.1 This agreement regulates the relations between the course creator (hereinafter - the Creator) and the Marketplace (hereinafter - the Marketplace) on placement and sale of online video courses.
contract_for_seller_2_1: 2.1 The Creator is obliged to post only those courses that are his author's works.
contract_for_seller_2_2: 2.2 The Marketplace undertakes to provide a platform for selling courses and technical support.
contract_for_seller_3_1: 3.1 The creator receives 85% of the course price, which he/she put up when creating the course.
contract_for_seller_3_2: 3.2 The Marketplace keeps a commission of 15%.
contract_for_seller_3_3: 3.3 All 85% of the course price from the sale goes to the wallet specified during activation.
contract_for_seller_4_1: 4.1 To activate the course, the Creator must have at least one module with 1 lesson containing video.
contract_for_seller_4_2: 4.2 In case of copyright infringement, the Course Creator is responsible.
contract_for_seller_4_3: 4.3 In case of revealing the fact of publishing someone else's course, the Creator may be sanctioned with fines according to the legislation.
contract_part_5_1: 5.1 Marketplace does not store wallet data.
contract_for_seller_5_2: 5.2 This agreement comes into force from the moment of course activation.
contract_for_customer: Contract between course buyer and course seller
contract_for_customer_1_1: 1.1 This agreement regulates the relationship between the buyer of the course (hereinafter - the Buyer) and the creator of the course (hereinafter - the Seller) on the purchase and use of online video courses.
contract_for_customer_2_1: 2.1 The Seller undertakes to provide access to the purchased course, modules and lessons after successful activation of the course.
contract_for_customer_2_2: 2.2 The Buyer undertakes to use the course for personal use only and not to distribute it.
contract_for_customer_3_1: 3.1 The Buyer pays for the course according to the price indicated.
contract_for_customer_4_1: 4.1 The Seller is responsible for the content of the course and its compliance with the stated requirements.
contract_for_customer_4_2: 4.2 In case of copyright infringement, the Seller is responsible.
contract_for_customer_5_2: 5.2 This agreement comes into effect from the moment of course purchase and is valid until the access to the course is completed.
course_not_activated: Course not activated in TON blockchain by the seller
course_need_deploy: The balance of the Course smart contract is 0. In this case, the course purchase will not be available to users. Please click on the "Activate" button
cover_label_course_link: Image link for the course cover
delete_course: Are you sure you want to delete course
delete_type: Are you sure you want to delete {{type}}
dont_close: Please don't close the app until notified!
email_confirmed: Your e-mail address has been verified
i_accept_the_terms: By clicking on this button, I accept the terms of the agreement
i_accept_the_terms_personal_data: and consent to the processing of personal data

modal.activating: Thank you for activating the course
modal.additional_benefits: Our users receive additional benefits for actively participating on the platform. Earn points and enjoy the benefits we offer. The more you participate, the more bonuses you get

modal.earn_for_reviews: Soon you will be able to earn points for writing reviews and inviting friends.
modal.future_exchange: In the future you will be able to exchange your points for tokens and use them as you see fit
modal.offers: Our online video course marketplace offers you a unique opportunity to earn points for active participation and get nice bonuses for it
modal.purchasing: Thank you for purchasing the course
modal.spend: What can I spend my points on
